t: 1:6*r Some Hb mss, LXX, Vg; other Hb mss read Diphath; Gn 10:3
1:7*r Some Hb mss, Syr read Dodanim; Gn 10:4
1:36*r LXX; MT reads and Timna and Amalek; Gn 36:12
2:6*r Some Hb mss, LXX, Syr, Tg, Vg read Darda; 1Kg 4:31
2:24*r LXX, Vg read death, Caleb slept with Ephrath (Hezron’s wife was Abijah) and she bore
2:42*r Lit and the sons of Mareshah
3:21*r LXX reads Jeshaiah, his son Rephaiah, his son Arnan, his son Obadiah, and his son Shecaniah
4:9*r In Hb, the name Jabez sounds like “he causes pain.”
4:13*r LXX, Vg; MT omits and Meonothai
4:22*r Tg, Vg; MT reads and Jashubi Lehem
5:15*r Lit the house of their fathers, also in v. 24
5:25*r Lit the peoples of the land
6:1*r In Hb Levi’s son’s name is spelled “Gershon” here and many other places
6:28*r Some LXX mss, Syr, Arabic; other Hb mss omit Joel; 1Sm 8:2
6:58*r Some Hb mss, LXX; other Hb mss read Hilez
7:2*r Lit the house of their fathers, also in vv. 4,7,9,40
7:23*r In Hb, the name Beriah sounds like “in misfortune.”
8:3*r Or Gera father of Ehud; Jdg 3:15
8:13–14*r LXX reads Gath 14 and their brother
8:40*r Lit valiant ones who string the bow
9:9*r Lit the house of their fathers, also in vv. 13,19
9:31*r Lit with things prepared in pans
9:41*r LXX, Syr, Tg, Vg, Arabic; MT omits and Ahaz; 1Ch 8:35
11:1*r Lit your bone and your flesh
11:22*r Or He killed two Moabite warriors
12:28*r Lit the house of his father
12:30*r Lit the house of their fathers
15:18*r Some Hb mss, LXX; other Hb mss read Zechariah son and Jaaziel
15:20*r This may refer to a high pitch, perhaps a tune sung by soprano voices; the Hb word means “young women”; Ps 46 title
16:19*r One Hb ms, LXX, Vg; other Hb mss read you
16:38*r LXX, Syr, Vg; Hb reads their
17:5*r Lit I was from tent to tent and from tabernacle
17:25*r Lit have uncovered the ear of
18:6*r Some Hb mss, LXX, Vg; other Hb mss omit garrisons; 2Sm 8:6
18:16*r Some Hb mss, LXX, Syr, Vg; other Hb mss read Abimelech; 2Sm 8:17
19:13*r Lit the Lord do what is good in his eyes
20:1*r Lit At the time of the return of the year
20:3*r Text emended; MT reads and sawed them with the saw; 2Sm 12:31
21:15*r Lit but as he was destroying
21:23*r Lit do what is good in his eyes
21:25*r Lit 600 shekels of gold by weight
22:9*r In Hb, the name Solomon sounds like “peace.”
22:14*r Lit 100,000 talents of gold and 1,000,000 talents of silver
23:24*r Lit the house of their fathers
24:23*r Some Hb mss, some LXX mss; other Hb mss omit Hebron’s; 1Ch 23:19
24:30*r Lit the house of their fathers
25:3*r One Hb ms, LXX; other Hb mss omit Shimei
25:5*r Lit by the words of God to lift a horn
25:9*r LXX; MT lacks his sons, and his relatives - 12
26:6*r Lit the house of their fathers, also in v. 13
27:1*r Lit that came in and went out month by month for all months of
27:24*r LXX; MT reads the number of the Historical Record
28:12*r Or he received from the Spirit
28:18*r Or chariot, that is; Ps 18:10; Ezk 1:5,15
29:2*r In Hb, the word antimony is similar to “turquoise”; Ex 28:18.
29:14*r Lit and from your hand we have given to you
29:17*r Or now with joy I’ve seen your people who are present here giving
29:22*r LXX, Tg, Vg; MT omits him
